text: The 1926 season was the Hawthorn Football Club's second season in the Victorian Football League and 25th overall since its creation in 1904. ==Fixture== ===Premiership season=== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%; text-align:center; width: 100%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" ! rowspan="2"| Rd ! rowspan="2"| Date and local time ! rowspan="2"| Opponent ! colspan="3"| Scores (Hawthorn's scores indicated in bold) ! rowspan="2"| Venue ! rowspan="2"| Attendance ! rowspan="2"| Record |- !
